mapper.insert:
SELECT CommonSeq.nextval AS "saleNo" FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO Common (saleNo, saleType, title, saleState, info, price, userNo, deadline, min) VALUES (#{saleNo}, #{saleType}, #{title}, #{saleState}, #{info}, #{price}, #{user.userNo}, #{deadline}, #{min})
mapper.select: SELECT saleNo, saleType, title, saleState, info, price, Common.userNo as "user.userNo", deadline, min, image FROM Common, UserTable WHERE saleNo = #{saleNo} AND Common.userNo = UserTable.userNo
SELECT saleNo, title, UserTable.name as "user.name", deadline FROM Common, UserTable WHERE Common.userNo = UserTable.userNo AND saleState = 'OPEN' ORDER BY saleNo
SELECT saleNo, title, UserTable.name as "user.name", deadline From Common, UserTable WHERE Common.userNo = UserTable.userNo AND Common.userNo=#{userNo}
SELECT saleNo, title, userNo FROM Common WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
mapper.insert:
SELECT CommonJoinSeq.nextval as "cjNo" FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CommonJoin (cjNo, userNo, saleNo, cjState, count) VALUES (#{cjNo}, #{user.userNo}, #{common.saleNo},#{cjState}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT cjNo, commonjoin.userNo as "user.userNo", Commonjoin.saleNo as "common.saleNo", cjState, count, common.title as "common.title" FROM CommonJoin, Common WHERE cjNo = #{cjNo} and commonjoin.saleNo = common.saleNo
SELECT cjNo, common.title as "common.title", count, cjState FROM CommonJoin, Common WHERE CommonJoin.userNo = #{userNo} AND common.saleNo = CommonJoin.saleNo ORDER BY cjNo

SELECT cjNo, common.title as "common.title", count, cjState, CommonJoin.userNo as "user.userNo", UserTable.name as "user.name" FROM CommonJoin, Common, UserTable WHERE CommonJoin.saleNo = #{saleNo} AND common.saleNo = CommonJoin.saleNo AND CommonJoin.userNo = UserTable.userNo ORDER BY cjNo
